Summary: Star-like shaped very bright light and image of a person standing below the light after that it flew away towards my security camera.I also have a perfect round circle that was flying across my backyard recorded
trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Anaheim
There were no other sightings in Anaheim on or around January 21st 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsThe nite that made me a believer! On January 21,2011 at the time of 18:24:50, my wife and I was laying on our bed and watching a movie. There had a very bright light on my front yard that I noticed on my TV monitor which I used for my security cameras.I did not know what I was looking at because I have never seen nothing like this. It was so amazeing to have this happened to me, I have never seen a light so bright in my life. This light was round in shape, the light was changing in shape to a star like figure. Than I noticed an image that looked like a person below the light with some type of craft under this person. Than all of the sudden the craft flew right towards my camera and was gone. I also have a perfect round white circle flying across my backyard recorded. Please contact me for the video, you have to have security software in order to open!
